9 Online Appendix C: Additional Results Appendix Figure 1 Response Rate by Cohort 0.25.5 Fraction 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 2004 2003 Application Year TFA Not TFA Appendix Figure 2 Survey Response by Cohort -.1-.050.05.1.15 ReducedFormEstimate 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 2004 2003 Application Year This ÃÂ¯gure presents point estimates and 95 percent conÃÂ¯dence intervals for the reduced form diÃÂ¯erence in response rates by cohort. The 2007 - 2009 cohorts are estimate using a regression discontinuity design, control for a quadratic in interview score and a quadratic in interview score interacted with scoring above the cutoÃÂ¯ score. The 2003 - 2006 cohorts are estimate using the interaction between interview subscores that determines TFA selection. For the 2003 - 2006 cohorts we include fully nonparametric controls for each interview subscore, and report the point estimate for an indicator variable equal to one if the combination of interview subscores is eligible for TFA admission.
